sources.description: PLOT : A party is thrown at a haunted mansion, people start to die, and a man who spent a night in the "blue room" disappears. --IMDb **Uploaded for educational purposes only; I own zero rights to this film and receive zero for the upload, other than the joy of sharing a great movie with all present & future generations.--def gp - ddh**
